COMMENTS: This is config file for deck list command
DECK_COMMAND is a list of the prefix that is used for command
DECK_MESSAGE_DEFAULT is the message to say
Only one card will be parsed to CARD_SINGLE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
Two or more cards will be parsed to CARD_PLURAL_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
CARD_SEPARATOR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT is a separator between card strings
<T_VIEWER> is the ID of Twitch viewer typed command
<C_COUNT> is the count of the card
<C_LIST> is the list of the cards
DECK_ENABLED determine whether use this command, true/false
TIMEOUT_GLOBAL is the cooldown of this command(ms, 1000ms=1ì´ˆ)
MAX_LEN is the maximum length of the one description of the card(2147483647 = infinite)
Be careful of the JSON and Regex
